name: Cracker Barrel Country Green Beans
ingredients: 3 14-ounce cans whole green beans with liquid

instructions.ja: ベーコンと玉ねぎをみじん切りにする

instructions.en: In a 2-quart pot, cook chopped bacon until browned but not crisp. Do not drain the grease
instructions.sk: V 2-litrovom hrnci opečte nakrájanú slaninu do hneda, ale nie do chrumkava. Nevylievajte masť
instructions.ja: 2クォートの鍋で、ベーコンを茶色くなるまで炒めるが、カリカリにはしない。脂は捨てない

instructions.en: Add canned green beans with liquid, Splenda, salt, and pepper to the pot
instructions.sk: Pridajte do hrnca konzervované zelené fazuľky s tekutinou, Splendu, soľ a korenie
instructions.ja: 鍋に缶詰のグリーンビーンズ（液体ごと）、スプレンダ、塩、コショウを加える

instructions.en: Sprinkle chopped onion over the top of the beans without mixing
instructions.sk: Posypte nasekanú cibuľu na vrch fazuliek bez premiešania
instructions.ja: 刻んだ玉ねぎをグリーンビーンズの上に振りかけ、混ぜない

instructions.en: Cover the pot and bring to a light boil
instructions.sk: Prikryte hrniec a priveďte do mierneho varu
instructions.ja: 鍋に蓋をして軽く沸騰させる

instructions.en: Reduce heat and simmer for 45 minutes
instructions.sk: Znížte teplotu a varte na miernom ohni 45 minút
instructions.ja: 火を弱めて45分間煮込む
必要に応じて味を調整する
